text: Eliomys is a genus of rodent in the Gliridae family. It contains the following species: * Asian Garden Dormouse (Eliomys melanurus) * Maghreb Garden Dormouse (Eliomys munbyanus) * Garden dormouse (Eliomys quercinus) ==References== *Holden, M. E.. 2005. Family Gliridae. Pp. 819-841 in Mammal Species of the World a Taxonomic and Geographic Reference. D. E. Wilson and D. M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore. Category:Dormice
title: Eliomys
